questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A bird in a glass cage

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A museum exhibit
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird
C) A person
D) A painting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A bird perched on a branch
C) A person walking
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A lake
B) A bird perched on a branch
C) A group of people
D) A building

What type of bird is in the photo?
A) A parrot
B) A falcon
C) A penguin
D) A sparrow

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Gray

A) A metal rod
B) A tree branch
C) A wooden fence
D) A rock

A) Solid black
B) Spotted brown and white
C) Solid white
D) Solid blue

A) Wood
B) Glass
C) Metal
D) Plastic

B) Another bird
C) People
D) Bird, image and text

B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow/ brown

A) A forest

D) A city park

B) Eating
C) Perching
D) Swimming

B) Indoor museum lighting
C) Street lighting
D) Candlelight

B) Standing upright
C) Flying
D) Sitting

D) Red

D) Four
